name: expat-wasm
description: Evented parser based on a WASM-compiled version of expat

scripts.prerelease: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run doc && git diff --quiet --exit-code
scripts.release: npm version patch && git push --follow-tags && npm publish
scripts.build: (cd wasm && ./setup && ./wmak) && npm run ts && npm run doc && npm run lint

author: Joe Hildebrand <joe-github@cursive.net>
